2015.03.06-legacy:
 · Fix: Spoiler photo from hint not always downloaded
 
 2014.09.02-legacy:
 · Fix: Recognize new date formats on geocaching.com
 · Fix: Date for event caches are not available in search results
 
 2014.07.27-legacy:
 · Fix: Slow login on gc.com
 · Fix: Usernames with < or > have not been able to login
 · Fix: Support mails sent from cgeo will contain version info in subject
 
 2014.07.18-legacy:
 · Fix: Allegedly only "unpublished" caches for some users on some mobile networks
 
 2014.07.12-legacy:
 · Fix: Caches not stored if "Ask for list" is disabled
 · Fix: Use "Unknown" instead of "Mystery" in GPX export to ensure backward compatibility
 · Fix: Avatar not shown in login confirmation screen
 · Fix: Loading more than 40 caches in search results
 
 2014.06.12-legacy:
 · Fix: Adapting to changes on gc.com
 · Fix: Do not crop static maps to prevent the copyright notice being cut off
 
 2014.05.15-legacy:
 Bugfixes:
 · Adapting to changes on geocaching.com
 
 2014.04.10-legacy:
 Bugfixes:
 · Corrected the closeout warning:
 Only devices with an Android version below 2.3 are affected
 
 2014.04.01:
 Bugfixes:
 · OC-login was not possible if no GC-login stored
 · Geocodes are always case insensitive
 · Fixed crashes in dir chooser
 · Log password field missing for OC if changing log type
 · Send2cgeo import screen not shown on second import start
 · Fixed parsing of waypoints from personal note if no valid coords stored
 · Special log types for unpublished caches now recognized correct
 · HTML entities in image titles are properly decoded
 
 2014.02.04:
 · Reinstate parsing of trackable name and owner after gc.com change
 · Minor stability fix
 
 2014.01.25
 Bugfixes:
 · Twitter problem fixed
 · Some phones wouldn't let c:geo add new pictures to logs
 
 2014.01.22
 Bugfixes:
 · Select log photo from alternate sources on Android 4.4
 · Upload new photo with correct orientation
 · Choose another page if the latest active page does not exist
 · Various stability bug fixes
 
 2014.01.06
 New Features:
 · Browse pocket queries online (press menu on main screen)
 · c:geo widget for direct access to stored lists
 · Support of extremcaching.com, with online searches and live map
 · Search by owner/finder for opencaching websites
 · better support of opencaching.com (Garmin)
 · Popup on map shows date of event caches
 · GPX import from Google Drive, Dropbox, … (requires Android 4.4)
 · Show cache where a Geokrety is currently placed
 · Configurable twitter templates
 · Creating a new WP the type will be preset depending on the cache type
 · Show event date for OC event caches in search results
 · Sorting caches by favorite point percentage
 · Filtering caches which have a personal note
 · Include TB inventory in GPX export
 · New popularity ratio filter (percentage of favorite points)
 · QR code scanner supports TB URLs
 · Limit initial zoom on live map to avoid huge area loading
 · Preparation for new c:geo contacts plugin
 · Show geokrety image
 · Preparation for Pebble navigation app (authored by another developer)
 
 Bugfixes:
 · Reduce memory usage for OSM mapsforge to avoid crashes
 · Optimize database access for faster live map loading
 · In rare cases GPS was not switched off when leaving the app
 · Cache type filter was not applied for OC nearby search
 · No cache coords if cache is at equator or prime meridian
 · Parts of the compass not shown when using big fonts
 · WP with special characters have not been shown
 · Disallow deletion of all caches incl. list if a filter is in use
 · OC authorization page not shown in light theme
 · DirChooser not showing all dirs on some devices
 · Allow manual path input in dirchooser
 · Network timeout reduced to 30 seconds to avoid long waiting time
 · Show as list also possible when map is not live
 · Respect limit of 500 chars for personal note on gc.com on upload or merge
 · GPX export did not export archived status
 · Hint was not removed from stored caches if removed on website
 · Short description was not removed from stored caches if removed on website
 · Attribute was not removed from stored caches if removed from the website
 · Fixed rare crash when logging an event cache
 · Waypoints have sometimes been doubled when refreshing cache
 · Preview image for logpicture was downscaled to wrong size
 · Optimized login procedure and session management for gc.com
 · Corrected attribute loading for opencaching.pl
 · A lot of changes for more stability and usability
 · Personal note upload now only for PM
 · Find count not updated is user has found 1 cache
 
 
 Detailed list of all changes
 
 Old releases
 · Please refer to the release notes on the c:geo-website.
 
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 On low zoom owned/found caches may not be hidden anymore
